verbs.description: [ARG1: Kim Jong Un] [V: arrived] [ARG4: at Singapore Changi Airport] [ARGM-PRP: for the summit with President Donald Trump] . The swanky airport has a rooftop pool , butterfly garden , free movie theater , facial recognition boarding gates and more . It also has some of the best food in the country . People arrive early to take advantage of the airport 's amenities .
